a11rallypong

Class MainMenuGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • a11rallypong.MainMenuGUI

  • public class MainMenuGUI
extends java.lang.Object
    The MainMenuGUI class creates a GUI that the user can decide what to do in the game. Three buttons are presented in this GUI; Play Game, High Scores and Exit Game.
    Author:
    Erich

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MainMenuGUI()
      Create the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.awt.Rectangle getScreenTotalArea(java.awt.Window windowOrNull)
      The getScreenTotalArea method finds the size of the users screen so that the game can be fullscreen on any screen size and the play area will adapt to this size.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      Launch the application.

      • main

      • getScreenTotalArea

        public static java.awt.Rectangle getScreenTotalArea(java.awt.Window windowOrNull)
        The getScreenTotalArea method finds the size of the users screen so that the game can be fullscreen on any screen size and the play area will adapt to this size.
        Parameters:
        windowOrNull - the window the method should find the size of.
        Returns:
        a Rectangle representing the dimesions of the screen.
